whatTheyOffer: Niroga Institute promotes equity through trauma-informed dynamic mindfulness, strengthening resilience and empathy in schools and communities. In 2017 Niroga committed its resources to a powerful but simple vision: A Million Mindful Children. Currently they are focused on supporting children and youth as well as their adult allies like family members, educators, school leaders, and administrators. They also work with communities through juvenile justice and behavioral health agencies.
